articles.title: 'They thought the chosen players were better than me': India star on T20 WC snub - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The India star spoke in detail about being dropped from the squad for the last year's T20 World Cup.
articles.content: Team India endured a poor outing in the previous year's T20 World Cup, where the side was knocked out in the group stages. The Virat Kohli-led Indian team conceded defeats to Pakistan and New Zealand… [+1861 chars]
